title: Tell me about a bike ride you remember.

korean: 아, 지난 5월에 친구들이랑 같이 탄 게 기억에 남아요.
그날 날씨가 진짜 완벽했거든요. 맑고 바람도 시원하고.
음, 우리 넷이서 공공자전거 따릉이 빌려서 탔어요.
여의도에서 시작해서 반포 한강공원까지 갔다가 다시 돌아왔죠.
중간에 배고파서 편의점에서 삼각김밥이랑 음료수 사먹고요,
한강 잔디밭에 앉아서 쉬면서 수다도 떨었어요.
그때 벚꽃이 조금 남아있어서 풍경이 정말 예뻤거든요.
한 명은 자전거를 잘 못 타서 중간에 휘청거리고 그랬는데,
그게 또 재밌더라고요. 다들 웃으면서 즐겁게 탔어요.
총 3시간 정도 탔는데 전혀 안 지루하고 재밌었어요.
다음엔 좀 더 먼 거리 도전해보고 싶다고 얘기했죠.
그날 이후로 가끔씩 같이 타러 가곤 해요.
english: Oh, I remember riding with friends last May.
The weather was really perfect that day. Clear and the wind was cool too.
Um, the four of us rented Ttareungyi public bikes and rode.
We started from Yeouido, went to Banpo Hangang Park, and came back.
In the middle we got hungry so we bought triangle kimbap and drinks at a convenience store,
and sat on the Hangang lawn, resting and chatting.
There were still some cherry blossoms left, so the scenery was really pretty.
One person couldn't ride a bike well so they wobbled in the middle,
but that was fun too. Everyone laughed and enjoyed riding.
We rode for about 3 hours total and it wasn't boring at all, it was fun.
We talked about wanting to try a longer distance next time.
Since that day, we occasionally go riding together.
